title: Pixel 3a system update december 2020?
content:
Yesterday, December 1st 2020 1900 GMT approx, I noticed an icon in the status bar which I didn't recognise. When I dragged it down It was a message saying something like 'press continue to restart after system update'. I wish I'd paid more attention.

The icon from memory was a vertical rectangle with top and bottom thirds solid, middle blank.

I tapped and the phone restarted.

There is no update to system - still shows November update.
Google Play Protect scan shows no errors. 

I can't find any audit log. I have connected with adb and can see the file structure, but my skills aren't up to finding any logs to check.

Any ideas what the update was or if there are any logs anywhere I can check?

Thanks
